metadata.title: CVE-2009-4490 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: mini_httpd 1.19 writes data to a log file without sanitizing non-printable characters, which might allow remote attackers to modify a window's title, or possibly execute arbitrary commands or overwrite files, via an HTTP request containing an escape sequence for a terminal emulator.

notes.note: jdstrand> if there is a problem, it is the terminal that has the issue

criterions.comment: mini-httpd package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
